name: Dive (itch) (WesleyHabbershaw)
description:
Dive is a competitive style game where 4 rivalling companies fight over valuable treasure scattered across the ocean, they will do anything to gather the most amount of treasure.

Each player will be employed by one of each company to gather treasure, you must explore the ocean to find the lost treasure but if you descend deeper you can find the better treasure which can reward you with more score. But be careful who you meet as you can't trust anyone down in this ocean parts as you can be hunted by other players equipped with knives and harpoons.

Credits:

Wesley Habbershaw

Peter Hainsworth
